prompts: Create a playful dog-like Pokemon that loves to explore the forest and mountains.
Imagine a Pokemon with a brown and white coat, perfect for a snowy environment.
Design a small quadruped Pokemon that could fit into a family of friendly companions.
Show me a cute Pokemon with an energetic personality, ready for adventure in any terrain.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a wolf pup with distinctive features and a loyal nature.
I want a Pokemon that can blend into its grassy surroundings but stands out in urban areas.
Make a Pokemon that has an affinity for caves and mountains and looks adorable.
